description: '''The Farm''' are a British [[musical ensemble|band]] from [[Liverpool]]. Their first album, ''[[Spartacus (The Farm album)|Spartacus]]'', reached the top position on the [[UK Albums Chart]] when it was released in March 1991; ''Spartacus 30'' was released in 2021 to commemorate the anniversary.  ''Spartacus'' includes two songs which had been top 10 singles the year before. In 2012, they toured with their Spartacus Live shows and formed part of the Justice Tonight Band, supporting [[the Stone Roses]] at [[Heaton Park]], [[Phoenix Park]], [[Lyon]] and [[Milan]]. They formed part of [[The Justice Collective]] which had the 2012 [[Christmas number one]] with their recording of "[[He Ain't Heavy, He's My Brother#The Justice Collective version|He Ain't Heavy, He's My Brother]]".
